# iru_blueprints (Data Source)

List all blueprints in the Kandji instance.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `blueprints` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--blueprints))

<a id="nestedatt--blueprints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `blueprints`

Read-Only:

- `color` (String) The color of the Blueprint.
- `description` (String) The description of the Blueprint.
- `enrollment_code` (String) The enrollment code for the Blueprint.
- `icon` (String) The icon of the Blueprint.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the Blueprint.
- `name` (String) The name of the Blueprint.
